name: Final Fantasy Crystal Chronicles: My Life as a King
name_original: Final Fantasy Crystal Chronicles: My Life as a King
description: You are a young king who must rebuild his kingdom, beginning with the castle town. When the king first reaches the borders of his realm, he finds that the crystal in the center of town has given him special powers to be a "master builder," a unique ability he uses to construct houses, shops and the like to rebuild and revitalize his kingdom.
